titles.title: To inform the Senate that a quorum of the House has assembled and of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Notifies the Senate that a quorum of the House of Representatives has been assembled and that Newt Gingrich has been elected Speaker of the House and Robin H. Carle has been elected Clerk.
